publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2104 Dr Richard Simpson: Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award—That the Parliament congratulates Patrick Bowden-Smith from the East Neuk of Fife on winning the inaugural Scotland Nature of Farming Award; notes that the RSPB has teamed up with BBC Countryfile Magazine and with Butterfly Conservation and Plantlife to create this new Nature of Farming award which celebrates the fantastic work that our farmers already do for wildlife; recognises that the award is made through a vote by the public on the BBC’s Countryfile website and is the largest biodiversity award in the United Kingdom, and notes that it seeks to reward farmers who are taking action for wildlife and to highlight to the general public the work that our farmers do for nature. Supported by: Helen Eadie*
S3M-2104 Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award (lodged on 10 June 2008) Claire Baker*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2104 Dr Richard Simpson: Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award—That the Parliament congratulates Patrick Bowden-Smith from the East Neuk of Fife on winning the inaugural Scotland Nature of Farming Award; notes that the RSPB has teamed up with BBC Countryfile Magazine and with Butterfly Conservation and Plantlife to create this new Nature of Farming award which celebrates the fantastic work that our farmers already do for wildlife; recognises that the award is made through a vote by the public on the BBC’s Countryfile website and is the largest biodiversity award in the United Kingdom, and notes that it seeks to reward farmers who are taking action for wildlife and to highlight to the general public the work that our farmers do for nature. Supported by: Helen Eadie, Claire Baker, Jamie Hepburn

S3M-2104 Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award (lodged on 10 June 2008) Kenneth Gibson*, Des McNulty*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*, Cathy Jamieson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Karen Gillon*, Elaine Smith*, Ken Macintosh*, Mary Mulligan*, John Park*, Nanette Milne*, Jim Tolson*, Mary Scanlon*, Jim Hume*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-2104 Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award (lodged on 10 June 2008) Jackie Baillie*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-2104 Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award (lodged on 10 June 2008) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2104 Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award (lodged on 10 June 2008) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-2104 Nature of Farming Biodiversity Award (lodged on 10 June 2008) Rhona Brankin*
